DOC.brief_title: Multiple Doses Escalation Study SHR0302 Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18~70 year age day sign informed consent , Have diagnosis RA meeting 1987 ACR/EULAR criterion RA ACR functional class IIII , Body mass index ( BMI = weight/height square ( kg/m2 ) ) within range 19 30 , Have agree use anti rheumatic drug except study drug study period . Current therapy disease modify antirheumatic drug ( DMARD ) , exception Methotrexate ( MTX ) , Leflunomide , sulfasalazine , antimalarial , gold preparation , penicillamine , must discontinue period least 7 t1/2s prior dose , Previous RA treatment DMARDs drug strong immunosuppressive effect 3 month prior dose ( 12 month rituximab B cell deplete agent ) , Previous therapy NSAIDs oral glucocorticoid 2 week dose , Any parenteral ( intramuscular intravenous injection ) intraarticular corticosteroid therapy 4 week dose , Previous treatment interferon 4 week dose .
